nodeList.description:
A melee directional attack that that stuns enemies for 1 second. 100% increased stun chance against non-boss enemies.

1% more damage per 1% block chance (up to 100%, multiplicative with other modifiers).
Stuns caused by Shield Bash last longer.

nodeList.description:
If Shield Bash is used while you have a shield equipped, it fires shield fragments in a cone in front of you.

While Shield Bash is on cooldown you cannot block.

Only works if Shield Bash has a cooldown.
